title: Jesus Brings Peace in the War between Sowers and Reapers
description:
If there was a time when we wanted Jesus to be a Matrix superhero for some of us it would be now. The possibility of a modern plague that kills our weak and elderly makes death a very real thing up close. How do we process this? David Brooks in his Opinion piece this week noted that pandemics often kill compassion. 

Scarcity is a new thing for some of us. We hoard. We fear. We are ready to fight. Throughout history we survived by, as Abraham Lincoln said in his second inaugural "wringing our bread from the sweat of other men's brows". Certainly this is NOT what the Almighty had in mind according to Lincoln. 

Jesus wades into the centuries long battle between Jews and Samaritans and brings peace ending with a town declaring him to be "The Savior of the World." How does this happen? 

For a far more indepth treatment of John 4 here are my Sunday School classes https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLS_9gLx08z7QW9dvx1k3qPtwpGQ2TP0wE


To see the final cut check it out on the church channel https://youtu.be/1qH52wjEp8o


 Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/2uUhZBK The link will prompt you to download the software for this free group messaging service. This link updates every 100 users so look for the most recent videos if this link doesn't work.

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos.
